resources.string: Tāpiri i te whakapā i te aniraa te kotaha Kī mā…
Ko te monokia Pūrua. E hiahia ana koe ki te whakarite tautuhinga te tārua me te pupuri i tēnei whakamaumahara?
%s He pūrere atu tata kī ranei, ko koutou tino hiahia ana koe ki te whakamahi i tenei tuakana kotahi?
Kei te tīariari kē te ingoa kōnae %s. Tuhirua?
Te kahore a Pūkete Google anake ka taea e ki te tuku, NOT riro ia karere ki a koutou. E hiahia ana koe ki te tāpiri i tētahi pūkete Google?
Te hinaaro nei tatou i to koutou awhina whakapai ake SafeSlinger. E hiahia ana koe ki te tuku aunoa tetahi hē ki a tatou?
Me whakahōu te mau melo o te katoa, etahi kei te whakamahi ngā matua pakeke.
Kāore e taea te tākaro i te tuhi.
Hiahiatia whakaaetanga hopuoro kua ki te tuhi i tētahi karere reo haumaru. Paoa i te pātene %s mō ngā kōrero whakaaetanga SafeSlinger Uruoro.
No te tārua ki te whakahokia mai.
E kore e tautoko i te Pūrere tārua, whakaora.
Nā ki te bug i Android 4.1, ka whai koe ki te tango me te tāuta SafeSlinger.
Hiahiatia he pūkete Google te. Tēnā whakatuwhera i te kaiwhakahaere pūkete, me te tāpiri i tētahi pūkete Google.
Rehitatanga kahore whakamotuhēhē, tēnā ngana anō ā-ringa i muri mai.
E kore te mea e wātea ana mō tēnei putanga Rehita, tēnā tirohia hoki te putanga whakahoutia.
Rēhitatanga pūrere hē ki a Google. E kore e tautoko i tēnei wā tēnei pūrere pana karere.
Ratonga rēhita Pēhi e kore e wātea ana, te tabularaa ngana anō i te %d hēkona.
Kua rēhitatia maha rawa tono mō te Pēhi. Koa wetetāuta etahi atu taupānga, me te ngana anō.
Kāore e taea te tukua e tētahi āpitihanga kau.
Kāore e taea te tuku āpitihanga nui atu i %d bytes i roto i te rahi.
Kāore e taea te tukua e te āpitihanga korenga.
Kei te ngaro i te ingoa, whakatika tēnā tenei whakapā.
Kei te ngaro tēnei whakapā he ingoa, tīpako anō tēnā.
Kāore i taea tango kī tūmataiti.
E kore e te %1$s tautokona ana i runga i %2$s i tenei wa.
Kāore e taea te ki te whakaora %s.
E kore te mea e wātea ana rokiroki Kōnae.
He ingoa whakapā tika hiahiatia te.
He muhu te hōputu kī hoa.
Passphrases rapu utu i te iti rawa %d pūāhua.
Kihai i SafeSlinger kitea tautoko NDK i runga i tenei whakaaro, e hiahiatia ana e te.
E ngana ana koe ki te tuku i ngā tūemi maha. I tenei wa, anake te tautoko SafeSlinger te tuku i tetahi take i te wa.
E kore he te tatūnga pūkete Īmēra!
Kua nui koe i te motunga karere mo taua kaiwhiwhi. Ngana anō koa i muri.
E kaiwhiwhi he rēhita pana ngaro, ahakoa kino. Kia mutu e koe te tuku karere ki tenei pūrere.
Ko nui rawa te karere. Whakaititia te rahi o te karere.
Rēhitatanga pana o taua kaiwhiwhi he kore e whaimana. Ko te kaiwhiwhi kia kua wetetāuta SafeSlinger rānei, tahuri atu whakamōhiotanga. Kia mutu e koe te tuku karere ki tenei pūrere.
I hapa te kōrero ki te ratonga pana whakamōhio.
Kua nui koe i te motunga karere mo tenei pūrere. Ngana anō koa i muri.
E kore te mea e wātea ana mahi whakamōhiotanga tenei wa. Koa ngana ki te tuku i te karere i muri mai.
Kāore e taea te faaineine i te kaiwhakamahara ororongo.
Hei tīmata, kotaha Kī ki tetahi kaiwhakamahi i te wa ano.
Me koe i te āpitihanga he karere kuputuhi ki te tuku ranei.
Kāore e taea te tango i te kōnae ngā.
Kāore e taea te ki te ōrite te kī tūmatanui ki te kī tūmataiti i roto i te crypto kaiwhakarato.
Kāore e taea te ki te whakaora ki te pātengi raraunga karere.
Kāore e taea te ki te whakaora ki te pātengi raraunga kaiwhiwhi.
Kāore e taea te ki te whakahou i te pātengi raraunga karere.
Kāore e taea te ki te whakahou i te pātengi raraunga kaiwhiwhi.
Raraunga Whakapā i te hōputu hē.
Whakamahia tēnei mata ki te whakatakoto ia koutou ingoa ki te whakawhiti ki ētahi atu, me te kīangahipa ki te tiaki i ō raraunga. Paoa i te pātene meatia, ka mutu.
Hei taui raraunga tuakiri, te whakarite kei tata ranei ki runga ki te waea ngā kaiwhakamahi katoa. Ka taui te pātene haamata Exchange anake nga raraunga whakapā takina.

Kia hoki koe te huri i ngā raraunga whaiaro e pā ana ki tō tuakiri i runga i tenei mata mā te mirimiri i runga i te pātene ki tou ingoa. Tenei ka whakaatu i te tahua tuku ki a koutou Whakatikaina tou whakapā, Waihanga whakapā New, ranei Whakamahia tētahi atu whakapā.
Whakaatu ana tēnei mata karere mua katoa, me te tāpiritanga e wātea ana mō te download he tonu.

Whakamahia tēnei mata ki te takiuru ki te tono ki to koutou kīangahipa. Ki te mea kua wareware ki a koe tou kīangahipa, kia whakaputa e koe te kī hou tiakina e te kīangahipa hou mā te mirimiri i te Kīangahipa wareware? pātene. Paoa i te ingoa kaiwhakamahi ki te whakawhiti i waenganui i te mau taviri maha.
Whakamahia tēnei mata ki te huri i tō kīangahipa mā te tomo koutou kīangahipa whakamutunga mō te haamauraa, me te kīangahipa hou.
Kua whakaaturia Hoapā ki te mau taviri SafeSlinger konei, tetahi tīpako ki te tuku koutou karere ki.
A ka mutu, ka te kawa whakakitea he rārangi o nga raraunga tuakiri i whitia ai. Tīpakohia te hoapā e hiahia ana koe ki te whakaora me te pēhi i Kawemai.
Mā te mata ki a koutou tīpako rua iwi i piua atu e koe mau taviri ki te aroaro o ki te humarie tukua atu ratou mau taviri ki ia atu. Noa e pipiri ana faaite ka rite.
Mā te mata ki a koutou te tīpako i ētahi raraunga, me te kaiwhiwhi ki te tuku ki te. Noa e pipiri ana Tukua ka rite.
Mā te mata ki a koutou te huri i te tautuhinga taunoa mo te tono.
Hiahiatia whakaaetanga Camera ki te tāpiri pikitia ki te haumaru i ngā karere. Paoa i te pātene %s mo SafeSlinger kōrero whakaaetanga Camera.
Hiahiatia whakaaetanga Hoapā mo humarie te faaiteraa i kāri whakapā. Paoa i te pātene %s mo SafeSlinger kōrero whakaaetanga Hoapā.
Whakaaetanga whakamōhiotanga hoki rānei matohi rānei, kara, ka tau tohu, e hiahiatia ana mo te karere haumaru. Paoa i te pātene %s mo SafeSlinger kōrero whakaaetanga whakamōhiotanga.
E kore e te SafeSlinger arotautia mō ngā pūrere 5.x iOS. Titau SafeSlinger iOS 6 teitei ranei.
Hiahiatia whakaaetanga Photo Library ki te tāpiri pikitia ki te haumaru i ngā karere. Paoa i te pātene %s mō ngā kōrero whakaaetanga SafeSlinger Photo Library.

Ka taea e koe te tīpako i to outou kāri whakapā ki te tuku o koutou hoa, a ka whakamuna SafeSlinger reira mo a koutou. Hei whakahohe i tēnei āhuatanga, me tukua e koe SafeSlinger te uru ki o koutou Hoapā ka ui.
Taea e koe te tuhi i te karere reo ki te tuku o koutou hoa, a ka whakamuna SafeSlinger reira mo a koutou. Hei whakahohe i tēnei āhuatanga, me tukua e koe SafeSlinger te uru ki tou Uruoro ka ui.
He tono karere kua whakamunatia SafeSlinger e kore e taea te mahi i waho tuku karere hou i Tuhinga ko a. Hei whakahohe i ngā karere taumai, me tukua e koe SafeSlinger ki te tonoa koe e Tuhinga ka ui.
Pa ki ki te arotake i a koutou karere %d
Ke tō kī kua: te kotaha Keys ano.
Hei timata karere, kotaha Kī ki tenei kaiwhakamahi i te wa ano.
Hōputu matua tauwhāitihia: te kotaha Keys ano.
E tomo tou ingoa, me te kīangahipa ki te tiaki i to koutou raraunga:
Paoa tou ingoa, ki te tāpiri i tango raraunga whakapā ranei, tirohia tūemi e hiahia ana koe ki te faaite i, me te tap haamata Exchange ina rite etahi atu ki te utu:
Whakahohea te SafeSlinger iCloud te. Paoa i te pātene meatia, ka mutu.
No karere. Kia unga atu koe he karere i te ripa Tito.
Hei tāpiri kaiwhiwhi, te tuatahi te kotaha Kī ki tētahi, ētahi rānei kaiwhakamahi atu i te wa ano e koe me. Kia hoki e koe te tukua atu he kotaha Kī whakapā te aniraa i te tahua.
No ngā kōnae. Tūhono tō pūrere ki te iTunes, me ngā kōnae tō ki te kōpaki ngā.

Tangohia te kōnae ki te tāpiri:
E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakauru i %s ki a koutou.
Ki te tatū he hononga karere haumaru, e nehenehe tatou e te whakatau ranei waea ia atu i te wa ano, a ka kotaha Kī tika kotahi ki te manatoko i te hononga.
Taea e matou te tīmata karere haumaru ki te puna tuwhera SafeSlinger iPhone taupānga Android ranei?
Kua piri toku ngā taipitopito SafeSlinger whakahou.
Tirohia i ngā hoapā e hiahia ana koe ki te whakahou i roto i to koutou pukapuka wāhitau, ka haape\'ape\'a ia Kawemai ki te whakaora hoapā haumaru:
Whakaaturia tenei tīwhiri te wā i muri mai.
Tikiake aunoatia ngā āpitihanga karere, ka takiuru.
Wetemuna aunoatia ngā karere, ka takiuru.
Whiwhi pānuitanga inā tuimotu tārua i.
Whakaaturia te akoranga i mua i te ngana ki te kotaha Keys.
Paoa ki te tikiake i te kōnae
Paoa ki te tikiake i te karere
Paoa ki te whakatuwhera i te kōnae
Paoa ki te haere anō tauira karere
Paoa me te mau ki te tuku whakahou taipitopito.
Kōwhiri koe kia taea ai SafeSlinger iCloud tārua i roto i Tautuhinga iOS. Paoa i te pātene meatia, ka mutu.
Pa ki ki te whirihora tautuhinga te tārua.
Pa ki ki te whirihora tautuhinga wāhiki keteroki.

Hei tiaki i a koutou raraunga, e kore e rokiroki SafeSlinger koutou kīangahipa hea mo te ora. Kia uru atu anake koe kaiwhiwhi, me ngā karere hanga i raro i te takiuru kīangahipa taua. Heoi, kia whakaputa e koe he kī hou, me te kīangahipa, ka tapiti faahou te kotaha Kī ki o koutou kaiwhiwhi.
Ka mukua te mau taviri e whai ake nei:
Kāore he ake mau taviri tata atu koutou.
Mau taviri anake hanga atu i maoro atu i koutou, i hanga ki runga ki %s, kia mukua ai.
ka tono karere, e tatari whakautu…
whänui matua, ka taea e te tango i te i te wā i tēnei…
te fariiraa i te kōnae whakamuna…
Ora te kupu, ano he tauira.

Hoahoatia SafeSlinger ki te faaite ngāwari tuakiri raraunga, tangata i roto i runga i te waea ranei, whakamotuhēhē, tūmataiti, me te tonu. Ia tangata faaite i ia koutou ki te hanga i tētahi hongere haumaru pito-ki-mutu ki te tuku karere.
